amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part D of House Report 118-705 to direct the US Forest Service and the Department of the Interior to address reforestation and regeneration issues specific to the White Oak species through the White Oak Initiative and pilot projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barr amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Barr amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
